import React,{useState} from 'react'; import API from '../api'; export default function Register(){ const [name,setName]=useState(''); const [email,setEmail]=useState(''); const [password,setPassword]=useState(''); const [role,setRole]=useState('student'); const submit=async e=>{ e.preventDefault(); await API.post('/auth/register',{name,email,password,role}); window.location.href='/login'; }; return (

Register

setName(e.target.value)} placeholder='name' className='w-full p-2 border rounded' />setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder='email' className='w-full p-2 border rounded' />setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder='password' className='w-full p-2 border rounded' />
) }
